data.title: You're Beautiful Guitar Lesson - James Blunt
data.meta_description: In this You're Beautiful guitar lesson video, you will learn all the chords to this massive James Blunt acoustic guitar hit in just minutes!
data.text:
In this acoustic guitar lesson, I will show you how to play all the chords to James Blunt's massive hit "You're Beautiful".

First things first, we are in standard tuning with this one, but you will need to place a capo at the 8th fret in order to play all of those higher voiced chords like James Blunt does on the original recording.

When you finally get your guitar all set up, you will find that the chords used throughout this You're Beautiful guitar lesson are very easy to play even though they are so far up the fretboard. You may need to get acclimated to those higher frets though.

The are a few different sections you will be learning even though most of the use the same chords as other parts of the song.

The main thing you will want to focus on is how many beats each chord is played before moving to the next since the timing of the chords in each section can vary.

Also, the ending can be a little bit confusing so I decided to go through the entire ending by giving you the exact minutes and seconds that the section starts in the song. In that way, there will be a lot less confusion I hope.

Hope you guys enjoy learning this great acoustic guitar song!

Carl...

If these free lessons help you, please donate to keep new ones coming daily. Thanks!! ðŸ™‚

You're Beautiful Guitar Lesson - James Blunt
